name: MEC Overlord Gloves - Unisex
description: Maybe you have tons of talent for skiing, mountaineering, or climbing but no royal treasury to tap. Or maybe you simply trash several sets of gloves every season. Either way, the Overlords rule, delivering first class functionality for a peasant class price. It's good to have such friends in high places.Shells are durable nylon with an excellent polyurethane coating and DWR for weather protection.Light insulation and fleece linings in the shells allow stand-alone use.Synthetic palm material is supple and durable, and won't wet out.One-handed gauntlet cinches.Removable fleece liners are fully tailored for wearing on their own.
